name: zatrust-quickstart
postCreateCommand: bash -lc 'set -e; echo [postCreate] Ensuring writable node_modules; mkdir -p node_modules; if [ ! -w node_modules ]; then echo [postCreate] Attempting chown; sudo chown -R node:node node_modules || true; fi; echo [postCreate] Installing deps (ci->install fallback); (npm ci || npm install); echo [postCreate] Installing Playwright browsers; npx playwright install --with-deps; echo [postCreate] Done'
postStartCommand: bash -lc 'if [ ! -f .next/BUILD_ID ]; then echo [postStart] Starting dev server; npm run dev & else echo [postStart] Reusing existing build; fi'
